mapper.select:
SELECT a.product_sn productSn, a.name, a.id FROM dj_basics_product_template a WHERE 1 = 1
AND a.worker_type_id=#{workerTypeId}
AND ( a.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchKey},'%') or a.product_sn LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchKey},'%') )
AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM dj_skill_certification b WHERE a.id = b.product_id AND b.worker_id=#{workerId} )
